quotes.quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
Somewhere behind the athlete you’ve become and the hours of practice and the coaches who have pushed you is a little girl who fell in love with the game and never looked back… play for her..
Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.
I’ve learned that something constructive comes from every defeat.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.
My first bat was shaped of a coconut branch and from that day, all I wanted to do was to be a cricketer.
Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday!
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
